# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties

# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the

add_subdirectory(ut)

add_library(core-libs-throttling)
target_link_libraries(core-libs-throttling PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  core-libs-common
  cpp-actors-core
)
target_sources(core-libs-throttling PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/storage/core/libs/throttling/helpers.cpp
